lead_paragraph: Davis Love III said he was only trying to illustrate why his U.S. team should play with more swagger in the Ryder Cup. His comments wound up providing plenty of fodder for the Europeans, and perhaps a little extra motivation they didn't even need.

headline.print_headline: Europeans Motivated by Trying to Beat 'Best Team' Assembled
headline.main: Europeans Motivated by Trying to Beat 'Best Team' Assembled

snippet: Davis Love III said he was only trying to illustrate why his U.S. team should play with more swagger in the Ryder Cup. His comments wound up providing plenty of fodder for the Europeans, and perhaps a little extra motivation they didn't even need....
